text: Cheng Xingling () (1900–1987) was a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Liling, Hunan. He was a graduate of Peking University. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Hunan Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Hunan Category:Vice-governors of Hunan Category:Members of the 2nd Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Category:Members of the 5th Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Category:Members of the Standing Committee of the 6th Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Category:Peking University alumni Category:People from Liling Category:Politicians from Zhuzhou
title: Cheng Xingling
